variable: long term care expense per day

stochastic_function: lambda age, gender, maximum_coverage_per_day: {3764.89: 1.0} if age == 75 and gender == 'male' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 100 else {5647.33: 1.0} if age == 75 and gender == 'male' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 150 else {7529.77: 1.0} if age == 75 and gender == 'male' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 200 else {9412.22: 1.0} if age == 75 and gender == 'male' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 250 else {0: 1.0}

lambda age, maximum_coverage_per_day, insurance_premium_per_year, long_term_care_expense_per_day, life_expectancy: {-365 * long_term_care_expense_per_day - insurance_premium_per_year + 365 * maximum_coverage_per_day: 1.0} if long_term_care_expense_per_day > maximum_coverage_per_day else {-insurance_premium_per_year: 1.0}
evidence: long term care expense per day
